name: Miscen...AGAIN?!
description:
Miscen...AGAIN!? Made for Ludum Dare 46 and Geta Jam
You've just found Miscen! But...there she goes again...
  • Why is your charger missing? Your laptop just died because of it!
  • Who stole your watering can? Your plants died from having nothing to drink!

Miscen keeps taking your belongings, can you get them back?
Solve these riddles and find **Miscen** before something goes *horribly wrong*!

Controls:

WASD/Arrows: Move
E: Interact/Search
M: Show/Hide Riddle Sheet

Credits:

Programming: @danidre
Design: @TMG
Art: @rbatistadelima
Audio/Composer: @JasmineCooper
